name: SUBTERROR
description:
You awaken on a ship to the sound of a distress call. Where is everyone? Why does it look so wrong? And what does the ship have in store for you?

S U B T E R R O R .

Lose yourself to your deepest fear.

This experience was made for the Two-Minute Horror Jam.

HOW TO EXPLORE THE SHIP:
  • ARROW KEYS to move.
  • MOUSE to turn head.
  • SHIFT to run.
CREDITS:

Textures:

  • Doom, Blood, Duke Nukem 3D, Shadow Warrior

Sound:

  • Half-Life & Half-Life 2 (Release/Beta)
  • OpenAI - "Classic Pop, in the style of Frank Sinatra - Jukebox"

Special Thanks:

  • culture - Mesh deform & blinking scripts, general support
  • pastasfuture & PixelDough - HPSX Render Pipeline
  • The Haunted PS1 community  ♥
